mapper.insert:
insert into ANIMAL( ANIMAL_TYPE, ANIMAL_SIZE, ANIMAL_NAME, ANIMAL_GENDER, ANIMAL_AGE, ANIMAL_CONTENT, ANIMAL_DISEASE, ANIMAL_NEUTRAL, ANIMAL_COST, ANIMAL_TIME, ANIMAL_DATE, ANIMAL_FILENAME, ANIMAL_PATH, ANIMAL_UUID
) values( #{ANIMAL_TYPE}, #{ANIMAL_SIZE}, #{ANIMAL_NAME}, #{ANIMAL_GENDER}, #{ANIMAL_AGE}, #{ANIMAL_CONTENT}, #{ANIMAL_DISEASE}, #{ANIMAL_NEUTRAL}, #{ANIMAL_COST}, #{ANIMAL_TIME}, #{ANIMAL_DATE}, #{ANIMAL_FILENAME}, #{ANIMAL_PATH}, #{ANIMAL_UUID} )
